meanings.definition: A molecule consisting of a single nucleotide unit.
meanings.sent1: Scientists studied the mononucleotides under a microscope.
meanings.sent2: DNA is made up of mononucleotides like adenine and thymine.
meanings.sent3: The mononucleotides threw a party in the cell nucleus.
meanings.sent4: Each mononucleotide is like a tiny puzzle piece in the DNA strand.
meanings.sent5: The mononucleotides danced together, forming the genetic code.

meanings.definition: The building blocks of nucleic acids, such as DNA and RNA.
meanings.sent1: Our bodies need mononucleotides to create DNA and RNA.
meanings.sent2: RNA is composed of mononucleotides like cytosine and uracil.
meanings.sent3: The mononucleotides worked together to build a DNA ladder.
meanings.sent4: In the library of life, mononucleotides are the alphabet.
meanings.sent5: The mononucleotides lined up, ready to form a new genetic sequence.
